mapper.sql: (select o.*,p.PRODUCT_NAME,s.STRATEGY_NAME,c.CHN_NAME,a.AGENT_NAME from t_order_info o join t_pd_product p on p.PRODUCT_ID=o.PRODUCT_ID join T_PD_STRATEGY s on s.STRATEGY_ID=o.POLICY_ID join T_CUST_BASE_INFO c on c.CUST_BASE_INFO_ID=o.OLIENT_ID join T_AGENT a on a.AGENT_ID=o.SALE_CONSULTANT_ID)lo
mapper.select: select * from t_order_info where RC_STATE=0 group by ORDER_STATUS
select * from t_order_info where RC_STATE=0 group by CONTACT_STATUS
